channel.title: Reaper Mission Guide
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Reaper Mission Guide"

item.title: Re: Reaper Mission Guide
item.content:encoded: Id like to see a guide to each class. Like which allies to get first, which jutsu to learn and not learn, stuff like that.

item.title: Re: Reaper Mission Guide
item.content:encoded:
Shikai, Bankai, and Cobra Kai are all blood states, as is Dormant. The only reaper bloodline is (True) Blood of the Reaper. It's acquired after the Over the Edge special mission, and its name changes after Adventures in the Other Side ( it is still the same bloodline ).

Wasteland Disease is an easy third bloodline to obtain.

item.title: Re: Reaper Mission Guide
item.content:encoded: i'm trying to get bankai in order to ascend to jonin status and i am having trouble …i'm in season 2 and am having trouble trying to ascend …someone please help me …i need to know are bankai shikai and cobrakai all one bloodline or are they individual …also i need to obtain an easy third bloodline …what would anyone suggest i get ??

item.title: Re: Reaper Mission Guide
item.content:encoded: whoa wait. You can get the "save the soul reaper" mission by running tai missions alone? Then the missions page needs to be updated as it says it's a "rare" mission. I don't recall ever getting it while requesting tai missions but I doubt I was paying attention.

item.title: Re: Reaper Mission Guide
item.content:encoded:
"Does anyone know for sure whether you can get the "Save the Soul Reaper" mission when requesting Tai missions?"

Yes, you can. I just did it today.

item.title: Re: Reaper Mission Guide
item.content:encoded: Well I finally registered myself in these forums, I was the one asking about the D-Rank Missions. Thanks for the info Uzuki and sutasafaia. :)

item.title: Re: Reaper Mission Guide
item.content:encoded: Yeah, hit the big button on the left that says "D-Rank" or something like that instead of the "Gen/Nin/Tai" buttons on the right. It'll give you a random D-Rank mission, and you get a ryo bonus for taking a random one too :)

item.title: Re: Reaper Mission Guide
item.content:encoded: General missions instead of type specific ones? I was under the impression that after upgrading to Chunin you could only choose type specific D- Rank missions? Is there a way to do the D-Rank general ones?

item.title: Re: Reaper Mission Guide
item.content:encoded:
Well, there's two possibilities here, and I'm not sure which one it is…

Either the random number generator hates you and you've just been unlucky, or it's only possible to get that mission when you request general D-Rank missions. There is no way that I know of to figure out what missions you can only get when doing D-Rank missions though.

Does anyone know for sure whether you can get the "Save the Soul Reaper" mission when requesting Tai missions?

I know when I did it, I was requesting general missions, but only because I needed a ton of stuff from D-Ranks anyway. And even then, it still took me a couple of days.

item.title: Re: Reaper Mission Guide
item.content:encoded: Oy, I forgot to log in again. You may want to do general missions and not type specific ones. I think the save the soul reaper is nin/gen and not tai. not 100% sure though

item.title: Re: Reaper Mission Guide
item.content:encoded: It's just bad luck. I've had tons of that mission but, on the other hand, I haven't seen the mission to get lil' whitey even once and that's also a D rank one.

item.title: Re: Reaper Mission Guide
item.content:encoded: Following the guide I've been doing D-Rank Taijutsu missions as a Special Jounin for 2 days straight and I haven't seen 'Save the Soul Reaper' mission as of yet, is this normal or am I missing something?

item.title: Re: Reaper Mission Guide
item.content:encoded:
Most of my Wiki instincts come from Wowwiki, which doesn't always claim to be neutral :)

The plan was to add a section for guides to the top menu when we at least have 1 more (either The Trade or Looping or something). Having a drop down menu for a single guide doesn't seem worth it to me yet.

Though, I was planning on having it be more accessible eventually. Wanted to run it through here first (get the forums some use).

item.title: Re: Reaper Mission Guide
item.content:encoded: Overall a good guide, though could be a bit more neutral (Damn wikipedia instincts). Also, it should be more visible; having to go through shorty's page is really unintuitive. We could probably add a new section to top called walkthroughs/guides and link it from there, as this would be one of the main things people might hope to find on the site.

item.title: Reaper Mission Guide
item.content:encoded: I wrote up an initial guide to the Reaper missions, from start to finish. It's available here. It's currently orphaned, but I'd like to create a section for Guides and Walkthrough's like these. In my mind, I think we should have a guide to The Trade, and a Guide to Looping, at the very least.
